entry.title: Squeezing every last drop out of a free Google compute instance.
entry.content:
TL;DR

  • Ran out of RAM on an f1-micro instance
  • Decreased application and database RAM Usage
  • Implemented a swapfile

A few months ago, I started a small project to experiment with VueJs and Spring Boot and decided to host a demo version of it. I didnâ€™t want to spend...
